quest.name: Soothing the Sting
journal:
Eshana requests your help with preparing a balm for the infirmary.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Obtain chunks of mudstone from Mirage Creek.
Deliver the chunks of mudstone to Eshana.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename. No pressing emergencies at the moment, but the infirmary could use a hand if you're willing.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: There's a problem with bugs, you sssee─the biting, ssstinging kind. Our sssentries finish their watches covered in weltsss, and we cannot ignore the effect thisss may have on morale.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Even the ssstrongest incense won't keep all the insssects away, but mudssstone can be ground into a passste that sssoothes the worssst of the itching. Might you bring me three or ssso chunksss? You'll find despositsss of the ssstuff in the waters of Mirage Creek.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Were you able to locate any mudssstone depositsss?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Yesss, these should do nicely. Once applied, the balm worksss to alleviate any irritation almossst immediately.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: It is a traditional remedy of ours, passed down through generations.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We do alssso have an alchemical sssalve made by your people which heals the bites themssselves, but it is in short sssupply. I would rather sssave it for the mossst sssevere cases, and rely on mudssstone for daily use.
